title: Looking for two amateur casters for a tournament
body:
On the 29th of this Month, from 1pm AEST, my friends and I are hosting a 8 team double elimination tournament and am looking for 2 casters who want some experience to cover the event. Its all online. The teams are made from a pool of players who give their rank and 2 role preferences, then we randomize the teams with fair and even ranks.

We're hoping to have casters cast the games for the day, and to stream the event (or atleast record it).



As per requested, by Little Witch Eve;
By casters, I would like two people to spectate the game, and cast/commentate over the plays, talk about win conditions, that kind of thing
You don't need any experience, by amateur I just mean not professional. 
By streaming, the best case scenario would you stream it via twitch or youtube. If your internet can't handle that, which is cool, then just recording it on your pc and uploading the casted replay afterwards.
You'd be spectating the games, so you would see the champ select then have the 3 minute delay.
I don't really have expectations, its more about just having two casters (two is better than one as it allows them to bounce off eachother) to talk over the game, makes the replays more hyped, and when we make highlights after, its better quality with casters.
I'm not worried about exposure or view count or anything like that


If you need anymore details, or are interested, just leave a comment and I'll get back to you

Cheers
Baguette "I WAS IN ALPHA" Lord
